name: Le Cadreur
body:
Le Cadreur
=======

A simple layout manager in javascript. With JQuery (yes, jquery everywhere), and CSS3 animations.


* You can see **[an example](example/index.html)**.
* _Or [the documentation](yuidoc/index.html)_.
tagline: A simple layout manager in javascript.
